Description: Body sherd of Rhodian pottery Vroulia cup, probably with everted rim; interior glazed black; part of incised quatrefoil in circle with added red; exterior glazed black; part of incised upright palmette with broad red line going lengthwise up centre of each frond; additional incised scalloped line framing top of palmette.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GN.20) (phase 3)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 163)
